content: **pattern group auroraknit s blankets for help support promotion info and chat** a simple textured striped blanket for a crib/small cot or pram gauge is not critical yarn used increased when blocked different tensions will affect size and amount of yarn used easy enough to make bigger width ways increase cast on in multiples of 4 length ways moss stitch section can be increased to 6 or 8 row instead of 4 stocking stitch sections can be increased from 6 to 8 row or the whole pattern repeat can be repeated more than 4 times
